snippet.title: Alluris Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Demo Available on the Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/alluris

Steam Page: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1078510/Alluris/

This is the official Gameplay Trailer for Alluris!

562 Interactive is a indie game dev bent on world domination. We've decided that making games is the best way to fund the construction of our evil lair (land inside volcanoes doesn't come cheap). Our newest game is Alluris: a swipe your own adventure game like no other!
